description: Primes p such that x^17 = 2 has no solution mod p.
comments: Complement of A049549 relative to A000040.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: ok[p_]:= Reduce[Mod[x^17 - 2, p] == 0, x, Integers] == False; Select[Prime[Range[1000]], ok] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 19 2012  *)
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(6000) | not exists{x : x in ResidueClassRing(p) | x^17 eq 2} ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 19 2012
author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, Jan 17 2001
